content: On September 21st, Thursday, the Porto de Leixões Cruise Terminal will host the 1st #MicrosoftBuildPortugal, an unmissable event for the developer community where they can stay up to date with all the latest developments in the world of programming with Microsoft experts which has the support of DevScope.Follow the link to check the agenda and register for free: https://lnkd.in/ea_p7hGZ …more
